results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, a(A087686(n)) = A001969(1+a(n-1)), a(A088359(n)) = A000069(1+a(n)), where A088359 & A087686 = numbers that occur only once & more than once in A004001, and A000069 & A001969 are odious & evil numbers.
